verses.verse: And it shall come to pass, if thou shalt hearken <WH8085> diligently <WH8085> unto the voice <WH6963> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, to observe <WH8104> and to do <WH6213> all his commandments <WH4687> which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>, that the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> will set <WH5414> thee on high <WH5945> above all nations <WH1471> of the earth <WH776>:
And all these blessings <WH1293> shall come <WH935> on thee, and overtake <WH5381> thee, if thou shalt hearken <WH8085> unto the voice <WH6963> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>.
Blessed <WH1288> shalt thou be in the city <WH5892>, and blessed <WH1288> shalt thou be in the field <WH7704>.

Blessed <WH1288> shall be the fruit <WH6529> of thy body <WH990>, and the fruit <WH6529> of thy ground <WH127>, and the fruit <WH6529> of thy cattle <WH929>, the increase <WH7698> of thy kine <WH504>, and the flocks <WH6251> of thy sheep <WH6629>.
Blessed <WH1288> shall be thy basket <WH2935> and thy store <WH4863>.
Blessed <WH1288> shalt thou be when thou comest in <WH935>, and blessed <WH1288> shalt thou be when thou goest out <WH3318>.

The LORD <WH3068> shall cause <WH5414> thine enemies <WH341> that rise up <WH6965> against thee to be smitten <WH5062> before thy face <WH6440>: they shall come out <WH3318> against thee one <WH259> way <WH1870>, and flee <WH5127> before <WH6440> thee seven <WH7651> ways <WH1870>.

The LORD <WH3068> shall command <WH6680> the blessing <WH1293> upon thee in thy storehouses <WH618>, and in all that thou settest <WH4916> thine hand <WH3027> unto; and he shall bless <WH1288> thee in the land <WH776> which the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> giveth <WH5414> thee.

The LORD <WH3068> shall establish <WH6965> thee an holy <WH6918> people <WH5971> unto himself, as he hath sworn <WH7650> unto thee, if thou shalt keep <WH8104> the commandments <WH4687> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, and walk <WH1980> in his ways <WH1870>.
And all people <WH5971> of the earth <WH776> shall see <WH7200> that thou art called <WH7121> by the name <WH8034> of the LORD <WH3068>; and they shall be afraid <WH3372> of thee.

And the LORD <WH3068> shall make thee plenteous <WH3498> in goods <WH2896>, in the fruit <WH6529> of thy body <WH990>, and in the fruit <WH6529> of thy cattle <WH929>, and in the fruit <WH6529> of thy ground <WH127>, in the land <WH127> which the LORD <WH3068> sware <WH7650> unto thy fathers <WH1> to give <WH5414> thee.

The LORD <WH3068> shall open <WH6605> unto thee his good <WH2896> treasure <WH214>, the heaven <WH8064> to give <WH5414> the rain <WH4306> unto thy land <WH776> in his season <WH6256>, and to bless <WH1288> all the work <WH4639> of thine hand <WH3027>: and thou shalt lend <WH3867> unto many <WH7227> nations <WH1471>, and thou shalt not borrow <WH3867>.

And the LORD <WH3068> shall make <WH5414> thee the head <WH7218>, and not the tail <WH2180>; and thou shalt be above only <WH4605>, and thou shalt not be beneath <WH4295>; if that thou hearken <WH8085> unto the commandments <WH4687> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>, to observe <WH8104> and to do <WH6213> them:

And thou shalt not go aside <WH5493> from any of the words <WH1697> which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>, to the right hand <WH3225>, or to the left <WH8040>, to go <WH3212> after <WH310> other <WH312> gods <WH430> to serve <WH5647> them.

Â¶ But it shall come to pass, if thou wilt not hearken <WH8085> unto the voice <WH6963> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, to observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> all his commandments <WH4687> and his statutes <WH2708> which I command <WH6680> thee this day <WH3117>; that all these curses <WH7045> shall come <WH935> upon thee, and overtake <WH5381> thee:
Cursed <WH779> shalt thou be in the city <WH5892>, and cursed <WH779> shalt thou be in the field <WH7704>.
Cursed <WH779> shall be thy basket <WH2935> and thy store <WH4863>.
Cursed <WH779> shall be the fruit <WH6529> of thy body <WH990>, and the fruit <WH6529> of thy land <WH127>, the increase <WH7698> of thy kine <WH504>, and the flocks <WH6251> of thy sheep <WH6629>.
Cursed <WH779> shalt thou be when thou comest in <WH935>, and cursed <WH779> shalt thou be when thou goest out <WH3318>.

The LORD <WH3068> shall send <WH7971> upon thee cursing <WH3994>, vexation <WH4103>, and rebuke <WH4045>, in all that thou settest <WH4916> thine hand <WH3027> unto for to do <WH6213>, until thou be destroyed <WH8045>, and until thou perish <WH6> quickly <WH4118>; because <WH6440> of the wickedness <WH7455> of thy doings <WH4611>, whereby thou hast forsaken <WH5800> me.
The LORD <WH3068> shall make the pestilence <WH1698> cleave <WH1692> unto thee, until he have consumed <WH3615> thee from off the land <WH127>, whither thou goest <WH935> to possess <WH3423> it.

The LORD <WH3068> shall smite <WH5221> thee with a consumption <WH7829>, and with a fever <WH6920>, and with an inflammation <WH1816>, and with an extreme burning <WH2746>, and with the sword <WH2719>, and with blasting <WH7711>, and with mildew <WH3420>; and they shall pursue <WH7291> thee until thou perish <WH6>.
And thy heaven <WH8064> that is over thy head <WH7218> shall be brass <WH5178>, and the earth <WH776> that is under thee shall be iron <WH1270>.

The LORD <WH3068> shall make <WH5414> the rain <WH4306> of thy land <WH776> powder <WH80> and dust <WH6083>: from heaven <WH8064> shall it come down <WH3381> upon thee, until thou be destroyed <WH8045>.

The LORD <WH3068> shall cause <WH5414> thee to be smitten <WH5062> before <WH6440> thine enemies <WH341>: thou shalt go out <WH3318> one <WH259> way <WH1870> against them, and flee <WH5127> seven <WH7651> ways <WH1870> before <WH6440> them: and shalt be removed <WH2189> into all the kingdoms <WH4467> of the earth <WH776>.
And thy carcase <WH5038> shall be meat <WH3978> unto all fowls <WH5775> of the air <WH8064>, and unto the beasts <WH929> of the earth <WH776>, and no man shall fray them away <WH2729>.

The LORD <WH3068> will smite <WH5221> thee with the botch <WH7822> of Egypt <WH4714>, and with the emerods <WH2914> <WH6076>, and with the scab <WH1618>, and with the itch <WH2775>, whereof thou canst <WH3201> not be healed <WH7495>.
The LORD <WH3068> shall smite <WH5221> thee with madness <WH7697>, and blindness <WH5788>, and astonishment <WH8541> of heart <WH3824>:

And thou shalt grope <WH4959> at noonday <WH6672>, as the blind <WH5787> gropeth <WH4959> in darkness <WH653>, and thou shalt not prosper <WH6743> in thy ways <WH1870>: and thou shalt be only oppressed <WH6231> and spoiled <WH1497> evermore <WH3117>, and no man shall save <WH3467> thee.

Thou shalt betroth <WH781> a wife <WH802>, and another <WH312> man <WH376> shall lie <WH7901> <WH7693> with her: thou shalt build <WH1129> an house <WH1004>, and thou shalt not dwell <WH3427> therein: thou shalt plant <WH5193> a vineyard <WH3754>, and shalt not gather the grapes <WH2490> thereof.

Thine ox <WH7794> shall be slain <WH2873> before thine eyes <WH5869>, and thou shalt not eat <WH398> thereof: thine ass <WH2543> shall be violently taken away <WH1497> from before thy face <WH6440>, and shall not be restored <WH7725> to thee: thy sheep <WH6629> shall be given <WH5414> unto thine enemies <WH341>, and thou shalt have none to rescue <WH3467> them.

Thy sons <WH1121> and thy daughters <WH1323> shall be given <WH5414> unto another <WH312> people <WH5971>, and thine eyes <WH5869> shall look <WH7200>, and fail <WH3616> with longing for them all the day <WH3117> long: and there shall be no might <WH410> in thine hand <WH3027>.

The fruit <WH6529> of thy land <WH127>, and all thy labours <WH3018>, shall a nation <WH5971> which thou knowest <WH3045> not eat up <WH398>; and thou shalt be only oppressed <WH6231> and crushed <WH7533> alway <WH3117>:
So that thou shalt be mad <WH7696> for the sight <WH4758> of thine eyes <WH5869> which thou shalt see <WH7200>.

The LORD <WH3068> shall smite <WH5221> thee in the knees <WH1290>, and in the legs <WH7785>, with a sore <WH7451> botch <WH7822> that cannot <WH3201> be healed <WH7495>, from the sole <WH3709> of thy foot <WH7272> unto the top of thy head <WH6936>.

The LORD <WH3068> shall bring <WH3212> thee, and thy king <WH4428> which thou shalt set <WH6965> over thee, unto a nation <WH1471> which neither thou nor thy fathers <WH1> have known <WH3045>; and there shalt thou serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, wood <WH6086> and stone <WH68>.
And thou shalt become an astonishment <WH8047>, a proverb <WH4912>, and a byword <WH8148>, among all nations <WH5971> whither the LORD <WH3068> shall lead <WH5090> thee.
Thou shalt carry <WH3318> much <WH7227> seed <WH2233> out <WH3318> into the field <WH7704>, and shalt gather <WH622> but little <WH4592> in <WH622>; for the locust <WH697> shall consume <WH2628> it.

Thou shalt plant <WH5193> vineyards <WH3754>, and dress <WH5647> them, but shalt neither drink <WH8354> of the wine <WH3196>, nor gather <WH103> the grapes; for the worms <WH8438> shall eat <WH398> them.
Thou shalt have olive trees <WH2132> throughout all thy coasts <WH1366>, but thou shalt not anoint <WH5480> thyself with the oil <WH8081>; for thine olive <WH2132> shall cast <WH5394> his fruit.
Thou shalt beget <WH3205> sons <WH1121> and daughters <WH1323>, but thou shalt not enjoy them; for they shall go <WH3212> into captivity <WH7628>.
All thy trees <WH6086> and fruit <WH6529> of thy land <WH127> shall the locust <WH6767> consume <WH3423>.
The stranger <WH1616> that is within <WH7130> thee shall get up <WH5927> above thee very <WH4605> high <WH4605>; and thou shalt come down <WH3381> very <WH4295> low <WH4295>.
He shall lend <WH3867> to thee, and thou shalt not lend <WH3867> to him: he shall be the head <WH7218>, and thou shalt be the tail <WH2180>.

Moreover all these curses <WH7045> shall come <WH935> upon thee, and shall pursue <WH7291> thee, and overtake <WH5381> thee, till thou be destroyed <WH8045>; because thou hearkenedst <WH8085> not unto the voice <WH6963> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>, to keep <WH8104> his commandments <WH4687> and his statutes <WH2708> which he commanded <WH6680> thee:
And they shall be upon thee for a sign <WH226> and for a wonder <WH4159>, and upon thy seed <WH2233> for <WH5704> ever <WH5769>.
Because thou servedst <WH5647> not the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> with joyfulness <WH8057>, and with gladness <WH2898> of heart <WH3824>, for the abundance <WH7230> of all things;

Therefore shalt thou serve <WH5647> thine enemies <WH341> which the LORD <WH3068> shall send <WH7971> against thee, in hunger <WH7458>, and in thirst <WH6772>, and in nakedness <WH5903>, and in want <WH2640> of all things: and he shall put <WH5414> a yoke <WH5923> of iron <WH1270> upon thy neck <WH6677>, until he have destroyed <WH8045> thee.

The LORD <WH3068> shall bring <WH5375> a nation <WH1471> against thee from far <WH7350>, from the end <WH7097> of the earth <WH776>, as swift as the eagle <WH5404> flieth <WH1675>; a nation <WH1471> whose tongue <WH3956> thou shalt not understand <WH8085>;
A nation <WH1471> of fierce <WH5794> countenance <WH6440>, which shall not regard <WH5375> the person <WH6440> of the old <WH2205>, nor shew favour <WH2603> to the young <WH5288>:

And he shall eat <WH398> the fruit <WH6529> of thy cattle <WH929>, and the fruit <WH6529> of thy land <WH127>, until thou be destroyed <WH8045>: which also shall not leave <WH7604> thee either corn <WH1715>, wine <WH8492>, or oil <WH3323>, or the increase <WH7698> of thy kine <WH504>, or flocks <WH6251> of thy sheep <WH6629>, until he have destroyed <WH6> thee.

And he shall besiege <WH6887> thee in all thy gates <WH8179>, until thy high <WH1364> and fenced <WH1219> walls <WH2346> come down <WH3381>, wherein <WH2004> thou trustedst <WH982>, throughout all thy land <WH776>: and he shall besiege <WH6887> thee in all thy gates <WH8179> throughout all thy land <WH776>, which the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath given <WH5414> thee.

And thou shalt eat <WH398> the fruit <WH6529> of thine own body <WH990>, the flesh <WH1320> of thy sons <WH1121> and of thy daughters <WH1323>, which the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430> hath given <WH5414> thee, in the siege <WH4692>, and in the straitness <WH4689>, wherewith thine enemies <WH341> shall distress <WH6693> thee:

So that the man <WH376> that is tender <WH7390> among you, and very <WH3966> delicate <WH6028>, his eye <WH5869> shall be evil <WH3415> toward his brother <WH251>, and toward the wife <WH802> of his bosom <WH2436>, and toward the remnant <WH3499> of his children <WH1121> which he shall leave <WH3498>:

So that he will not give <WH5414> to any <WH259> of them of the flesh <WH1320> of his children <WH1121> whom he shall eat <WH398>: because he hath nothing left <WH7604> him in the siege <WH4692>, and in the straitness <WH4689>, wherewith thine enemies <WH341> shall distress <WH6693> thee in all thy gates <WH8179>.

The tender <WH7390> and delicate <WH6028> woman among you, which would not adventure <WH5254> to set <WH3322> the sole <WH3709> of her foot <WH7272> upon the ground <WH776> for delicateness <WH6026> and tenderness <WH7391>, her eye <WH5869> shall be evil <WH3415> toward the husband <WH376> of her bosom <WH2436>, and toward her son <WH1121>, and toward her daughter <WH1323>,

And toward her young one <WH7988> that cometh out <WH3318> from between her feet <WH7272>, and toward her children <WH1121> which she shall bear <WH3205>: for she shall eat <WH398> them for want <WH2640> of all things secretly <WH5643> in the siege <WH4692> and straitness <WH4689>, wherewith thine enemy <WH341> shall distress <WH6693> thee in thy gates <WH8179>.

If thou wilt not observe <WH8104> to do <WH6213> all the words <WH1697> of this law <WH8451> that are written <WH3789> in this book <WH5612>, that thou mayest fear <WH3372> this glorious <WH3513> and fearful <WH3372> name <WH8034>, THE LORD <WH3068> THY GOD <WH430>;

Then the LORD <WH3068> will make <WH6381> thy plagues <WH4347> wonderful <WH6381>, and the plagues <WH4347> of thy seed <WH2233>, even great <WH1419> plagues <WH4347>, and of long continuance <WH539>, and sore <WH7451> sicknesses <WH2483>, and of long continuance <WH539>.
Moreover he will bring <WH7725> upon thee all the diseases <WH4064> of Egypt <WH4714>, which thou wast afraid <WH3025> of <WH6440>; and they shall cleave <WH1692> unto thee.

Also every sickness <WH2483>, and every plague <WH4347>, which is not written <WH3789> in the book <WH5612> of this law <WH8451>, them will the LORD <WH3068> bring <WH5927> upon thee, until thou be destroyed <WH8045>.

And ye shall be left <WH7604> few <WH4592> in number <WH4962>, whereas <WH834> ye were as the stars <WH3556> of heaven <WH8064> for multitude <WH7230>; because thou wouldest not obey <WH8085> the voice <WH6963> of the LORD <WH3068> thy God <WH430>.

And it shall come to pass, that as the LORD <WH3068> rejoiced <WH7797> over you to do you good <WH3190>, and to multiply <WH7235> you; so the LORD <WH3068> will rejoice <WH7797> over you to destroy <WH6> you, and to bring you to nought <WH8045>; and ye shall be plucked <WH5255> from off the land <WH127> whither thou goest <WH935> to possess <WH3423> it.

And the LORD <WH3068> shall scatter <WH6327> thee among all people <WH5971>, from the one end <WH7097> of the earth <WH776> even unto the other <WH7097>; and there thou shalt serve <WH5647> other <WH312> gods <WH430>, which neither thou nor thy fathers <WH1> have known <WH3045>, even wood <WH6086> and stone <WH68>.

And among these <WH1992> nations <WH1471> shalt thou find no ease <WH7280>, neither shall the sole <WH3709> of thy foot <WH7272> have rest <WH4494>: but the LORD <WH3068> shall give <WH5414> thee there a trembling <WH7268> heart <WH3820>, and failing <WH3631> of eyes <WH5869>, and sorrow <WH1671> of mind <WH5315>:
And thy life <WH2416> shall hang <WH8511> in doubt before <WH5048> thee; and thou shalt fear <WH6342> day <WH3119> and night <WH3915>, and shalt have none assurance <WH539> of thy life <WH2416>:

In the morning <WH1242> thou shalt say <WH559>, Would God it were <WH5414> even <WH6153>! and at even <WH6153> thou shalt say <WH559>, Would God it were <WH5414> morning <WH1242>! for the fear <WH6343> of thine heart <WH3824> wherewith thou shalt fear <WH6342>, and for the sight <WH4758> of thine eyes <WH5869> which thou shalt see <WH7200>.

And the LORD <WH3068> shall bring <WH7725> thee into Egypt <WH4714> again <WH7725> with ships <WH591>, by the way <WH1870> whereof I spake <WH559> unto thee, Thou shalt see <WH7200> it no more again <WH3254>: and there ye shall be sold <WH4376> unto your enemies <WH341> for bondmen <WH5650> and bondwomen <WH8198>, and no man shall buy <WH7069> you.
